scripts.say:
Eagle Union coastal waters 
	Siren Threat Assessment Rating: 3
Well, this isn't quite what I expected...
Weird that this place is rated STAR 3. I don't see enough Sirens to warrant it...
According to our intel, the Sirens' sphere of influence is rapidly shrinking in this area...
So, they're skipping town, pretty much?
Maybe, maybe not. As per usual, HQ can't really figure out what the Sirens are planning.
Well, if it results in this area being less dangerous, it's a good thing.
No, it's not. The more territory we control, the more thinly spread out our defenses get.
... I've got a bad feeling about this.
This mission is partly about uncovering what the Sirens are up to. All ships, keep your guards up as we advance.
